gameObjects

Class BlockPowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.GameObject
      • gameObjects.GameObjectXT
        • gameObjects.Block
          • gameObjects.BlockPowerUp

  • public class BlockPowerUp
extends Block
    Power up block. Destroyed after being hit 1 time by a ball. Releases a random power up upon destruction.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Tim Wostemeier, Juri de Vos
